attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I didn’t think there was an app that could get worse than good classroom but ladies and gentlemen, you got it. I downloaded this app with all the intention of keeping up with Trumps campaign and the election. As soon as I downloaded it, the problems started. At first, every time I would click the icon to open the app, it would quickly exit out and not let me use it at all. I though it was a glitch with my phone at first so I restarted it but it still did the same thing afterwards. This was very frustrating for me because it was keeping me from being informed and using the app for what it’s intended for. After a few more tries, it made my phone shut off by itself. I though it had died so I plugged it in but then it turned back on at 30%!! The worst part was that the android emoji began showing up sometimes which is very rare because I have an iPhone. It gets ever worse every time I try to use it. It’s as if my phone was taken over by a demon. I genuinely think my phone was hacked or something. Sometimes I even see the little light phones get when someone is using it to evesdrop on you. Either this app is very messed up and needs a lot more than bug fixes or it’s being used to hack into people’s phones. Please don’t get this app, you’ll regret it. I’ve also tried deleted it multiple times but again, it makes my phone shut off. I’m so annoyed and if I could rate this app a 0 or -5 stars, I definitely would.

attributes.title: 0 stars
attributes.review:
Man} Once upon a time there was a lovely princess.

But she had an enchantment upon her of a fearful sort which could only 

be broken by love's first kiss.

She was locked away in a castle guarded by a terrible fire-breathing 

dragon.

Many brave knigts had attempted to free her from this dreadful prison, 

but non prevailed.

She waited in the dragon's keep in the highest room of the tallest 

tower for her true love and true love's first kiss.

{Laughing} 

Like that's ever gonna happen.

{Paper Rusting, Toilet Flushes}

What a load of - 

Somebody once told me the world is gonna roll me

I ain't the sharpest tool in the shed

She was lookin' kind of dumb with her finger and her thumb

In the shape of an "L" on her forehead

The years start comin' and they don't stop comin'

Fed to the rules and hit the ground runnin'

Didn't make sense not to live for fun

Your brain gets smart but your head gets dumb

So much to do so much to see

So what's wrong with takin' the backstreets

You'll never know if you don't go

You'll never shine if you don't glow

Hey, now You're an all-star

Get your game on, go play

Hey, now You're a rock star

Get the show on, get paid

And all that glitters is gold

Only shootin' stars break the mold

It's a cool place and they say it gets colder

You're bundled up now but wait till you get older

But the meteor men beg to differ

Judging by the hole in the satellite picture

The ice we skate is gettin' pretty thin

The water's getting warm so you might as well swim

My world's on fire

How 'bout yours

That's the way I like it and I'll never get bored

Hey, now, you're an all-star

{Shouting}

Get your game on, go play

Hey, now You're a rock star

Get the show on, get paid

And all that glitters is gold

Only shootin' stars break the mold

{Belches}

Go!

Go!

{Record Scratching}

Go. Go.Go.

Hey, now, you're an all-star

Get your game on, go play

Hey, now You're a rock star

Get the show on, get paid

And all that glitters is gold

attributes.title: Very horrible
attributes.review: Fake news, hypnotic media to endorse white people to have pride in their own skin color and allow them to feel more superior amongst other races or people of other nations. Police brutality is still a huge problem in our system that needs to be solved. Our tax payers money is going towards these cops, when they do not receive the proper training to deescalate a conflict, which leads to unnecessary deaths which the police do not get punished because of the unfair system. Speaking of the system. It’s statically proven that a person of color and wealth will succeed without trying much, while a person of color will struggle and not achieve their goals despite trying their all time best. Better education should be given to all and the whole educational system should be fixed and funded more properly. Teachers should have better training and understanding amongst students. Giving more attention towards each individual and helping them in areas where they lack. Instead of treating them as a test taking robot and a number. There is more I can go on about, but I have to come to a end. IG,SC,TT Lt.Royal
